solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public String getHint(String secret, String guess) {--newline--        int bulls = 0;--newline--        int cows = 0;--newline--        int[] numbers = new int[10];--newline--        for (int i = 0; i<secret.length(); i++) {--newline--            if (secret.charAt(i) == guess.charAt(i)) bulls++;--newline--            else {--newline--                if (numbers[secret.charAt(i)-'0']++ < 0) cows++;--newline--                if (numbers[guess.charAt(i)-'0']-- > 0) cows++;--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--        return bulls + "A" + cows + "B";--newline--    }--newline--}
